alert.note: Alert for Shasta (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 21 at 6:08PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern California, including the following county, Shasta. * WHEN...Until 715 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 604 PM PDT, Thunderstorms have moved out of the area but localized flooding of low-lying and poor drainage area will continue to be possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Redding, Palo Cedro, Anderson and Millville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
